summary: Joy is an emotionally damaged young woman of eighteen, who was given up at birth, to grow up in homes and with foster families. She lives on the fringes of society, getting by on benefits ... See full summary Â»
cast: Samira Maas|Coosje Smid|Dragan Bakema|Sharon Schouten|Elisabeth Hesemans|Lisette Livingston|Dalorim Wartes|Kuno Bakker|Has Drijver|Olga Louzgina|Samir Naima El Bezaz|Fred Goessens|Verica Nedeska
title: Joy
